extension.description:
Tautulli is a python based web application for monitoring, analytics and notifications for Plex Media Server.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.tautulli: --------------------------
2.0.0 - Kodi Matrix compatibility
1.1.0 - Switch to multi-arch image
1.0.1 - Support *elec
1.0.0 - Initial release
